member.name: T:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowDialog
member.summary: Defines a child dialog of an app window.

member.name: M:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowDialog.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a default instance of the CoreWindowDialog class.

member.name: M:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowDialog.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the CoreWindowDialog class with the supplied title.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowDialog.BackButtonCommand
member.summary: Gets or sets the delegate called when the back button on the dialog is selected.
member.returns: The delegate called when the back button on the dialog is selected.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowDialog.CancelCommandIndex
member.summary: Gets and sets the command index value for the dialog cancel operation.
member.returns: The command index value for the dialog cancel operation.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowDialog.Commands
member.summary: Gets the set of user interface commands (UI) available on the dialog.
member.returns: The set of UI commands available on the dialog.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowDialog.DefaultCommandIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the dialog window's default command.
member.returns: The index value of the dialog window's default command (such as **OK**).

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowDialog.IsInteractionDelayed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether any UI interaction event message is slightly delayed or not. This delay prevents a user from accidentally invoking an action on the dialog window.
member.returns: **true** if a fractional delay is introduced to any interactions with the dialog; **false** if it is not.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowDialog.MaxSize
member.summary: Gets the maximum size of the dialog.
member.returns: The maximum size of the dialog, in pixels.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowDialog.MinSize
member.summary: Gets the minimum size of the dialog.
member.returns: The minimum size of the dialog, in pixels.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowDialog.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the dialog.

member.name: E:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowDialog.Showing
member.summary: Is fired when the dialog is displayed.

member.name: M:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowDialog.ShowAsync
member.summary: Displays the dialog and asynchronously waits for the user to take an action.
member.returns: The action performed by the user on the dialog, as well as information about the action.

member.name: T:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowFlyout
member.summary: Defines a child flyout of an app window.

member.name: M:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowFlyout.#ctor(Windows.Foundation.Point)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the CoreWindowFlyout class at the supplied position.
member.param: The pixel position on the screen where the flyout is to originate. The position provides the upper-leftmost corner of the flyout.

member.name: M:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowFlyout.#ctor(Windows.Foundation.Point,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the CoreWindowFlyout class at the specified position with the supplied title.
member.param: The pixel position on the screen where the flyout is to originate. The position provides the upper-leftmost corner of the flyout.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowFlyout.BackButtonCommand
member.summary: Gets or sets the delegate called when the back button on the flyout is selected.
member.returns: The delegate called when the back button on the flyout is selected.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowFlyout.Commands
member.summary: Gets the set of user interface commands available on the flyout.
member.returns: The set of user interface commands available on the flyout.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowFlyout.DefaultCommandIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the flyout window's default command.
member.returns: The index value of the flyout window's default command (such as **OK**).

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowFlyout.IsInteractionDelayed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether any UI interaction event message is slightly delayed or not. This delay prevents a user from accidentally invoking an action on the flyout window.
member.returns: **true** if a fractional delay is introduced to any interactions with the flyout; **false** if it is not.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowFlyout.MaxSize
member.summary: Gets the maximum size of the flyout.
member.returns: The maximum size of the flyout, in pixels.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowFlyout.MinSize
member.summary: Gets the minimum size of the flyout.
member.returns: The minimum size of the flyout, in pixels.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowFlyout.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the flyout.

member.name: E:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowFlyout.Showing
member.summary: Is fired when the flyout is displayed.

member.name: M:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowFlyout.ShowAsync
member.summary: Displays the flyout and asynchronously waits for the user to take an action.
member.returns: The action performed by the user on the flyout, as well as information about the action.

member.name: T:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowPopupShowingEventArgs
member.summary: Defines a method for setting the desired size of a popup window.

member.name: M:Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindowPopupShowingEventArgs.SetDesiredSize(Windows.Foundation.Size)
member.summary: Sets the desired size of the popup.
member.param: The desired size of the popup.
